title: A vvarnyng for the cittie of London that the dwellers therein may repent their evyll lyues for feare of Goddes plages.
author: Samuel, William, fl. 1551-1569.
publicationStmtPublisher: By me Humfrey Powell, dewellinge [sic] aboue Holburne Conduit, and are to be soulde by Hugh Syngleton at the signe of Saint Augustine in Polles Churcharde [sic],
